name: Healthy Broccoli Cheese Bake
author: RuthE
summary: A more nutritious version of the classic casserole, made with mushrooms, peppers, and whole-wheat bread crumbs.
ingredients: 7 cups frozen broccoli florets, thawed, well drained on paper towel
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat
Cook onion, bell pepper, mushrooms, 1/4 teaspoon salt, and black pepper, stirring frequently, until mixture begins to brown, 12 to 15 minutes
Sprinkle flour over mushroom mixture and cook, stirring, 1 minute
Add remaining 1/4 teaspoon salt and milk and bring to a boil, stirring until smooth
Boil, stirring frequently, until slightly thickened, about 3 minutes
Stir in cheddar and 2 tablespoons romano
Stir in broccoli and pour mixture into prepared baking dish
Toss bread crumbs with remaining 2 tablespoons romano and sprinkle over top
Bake, uncovered, until crumbs are golden and casserole is bubbling, about 40 minutes
